wikitext.*:
'''Ektelarni''' were most likely the [[fays]] of fountains, according to the early version of the [[legendarium]] associated with ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]''.<ref name=Ekt>{{PE|14}}, "[[The Creatures of the Earth]]", pp. 7, 10</ref>

== Etymology ==
The name ''Ektelarni'' is in [[Qenya]], probably being related to the word ''[[ektele]]'' or ''[[kektele]]'' ("fountain"),<ref name=Ekt/> with ''kektele'' being derived from the root [[KELE]] ("flow, run; ooze, trickle").<ref>{{PE|12}}, entry '''KELE, KELU''', p. 46</ref>
